Trojan Bot (Unibot on solana chain)

Trojan Bot is a groundbreaking tool on the Solana blockchain that has been making waves with its innovative features and lightning-fast transactions. In this Trojan Bot review, we’ll explore its great features and why it has become the go-to choice for traders seeking a competitive edge in the market.

Introduction
Trojan has rapidly emerged as a dominant force in the Solana ecosystem, achieving remarkable milestones in a short span of time. With over $100M in daily volume and an impressive $850M+ in total volume since its inception, Trojan has solidified its position as one of the top Solana trading bots in the crypto space. Having a daily user base of 25,000 active traders, Trojan’s success is a testament to the exponential growth of the Solana blockchain.

Benefits of Using Trojan Bot

1.Trojan represents a significant leap forward, delivering a trading experience that is both seamless and user-friendly, directly through Telegram. Born from the ambition to empower users with state-of-the-art trading functionalities and excellent UX through Telegram.

2. Basic Buy/Sell Orders: Trojan allows users to place buy and sell orders directly through their Telegram Bot. Users can specify the token they want to buy or sell, the amount they wish to trade, and the desired price level.

3. Limit Orders: With Trojan, users can set limit orders to execute trades at specific price levels. This feature enables traders to enter the market at their desired prices, helping them minimizing the need for constant monitoring.

4. Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) Orders: DCA orders enable users to automate their investment strategy by regularly purchasing a specified amount of a particular token over time, regardless of price fluctuations. Trojan allows users to set up DCA orders, helping them accumulate assets gradually and potentially reduce the impact of market volatility Copy Trading: Trojan offers copy trading functionality, allowing users to copy-trade any solana wallet.

5. LP Sniper (soon): this feature is currently in beta testing on selected users as of writing this article

6. ETH-SOL Bridge: Trojan facilitates cross-chain trading between Ethereum and Solana blockchains through its ETH-SOL bridge feature. This allows users to access liquidity and trade assets across both ecosystems seamlessly. The bridge enables users to swap Ethereum-based tokens (ERC-20) with Solana-based tokens (SPL) and vice versa, expanding their trading opportunities and access to different blockchain networks.

7. Pump.fun support. Trojan also support tokens that have been created at pump.fun, just paste the contract address you find in pump.fun to Trojan to trade them.


Pros
Trojan Bot offers enough features designed to enhance the trading experience: Limit Orders: Automatically execute trades at specific market levels, ideal for strategic buying and selling. Sniper Tools: Mirror successful traders and identify new token releases and liquidity on decentralized exchanges effortlessly. PNL Analysis: Gain detailed insights to track profits and losses, validating trading strategies and informing future decisions. Private Transactions: Conduct trades privately to shield against vulnerabilities like Miner Extractable Value (MEV) bot attacks. Fail Guard Sell Feature: Test orders beforehand to prevent failed transactions, saving on gas fees and maximizing profits. BOLT PRO: Designed to provide users with lightning-fast swaps and virtually zero failed transactions. With BOLT PRO, trades take less than 2 seconds on average and rarely encounter timeouts or failures. Discover new tokens: Check for new pairs directly from the bot menu. Fees: Customizable fee settings to prioritize transaction speed. Backup Bots: The backup bots are often faster due to a lighter user load. If you’re ever having trouble with the primary Trojan Bot jump into one of the backups by simply writing /backup. These bots give access to exactly the same Trojan wallet, token positions, and settings.

Trojan Bot on Solana Cons
Only available on Solana (for now). Might be overwhelming when starting out.

Conclusion
In conclusion, Trojan Bot stands as a revolutionary trading tool that is redefining the crypto landscape on the Solana blockchain. With its unmatched speed, reliability, and advanced features, Trojan Bot empowers traders to navigate the market with confidence and precision. Trojan Bot offers the tools and capabilities needed to succeed in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency trading.

Alpha Dex

Alpha DEX is a decentralized exchange (DEX) integrated within Telegram, providing users with a seamless platform for cryptocurrency trading and management. It supports multiple blockchains, including Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Base Chain, Solana, SUI Network, TRX Chain. Users can create a secure wallet by setting a four-digit PIN code and add funds by copying the wallet address or generating a QR code. The trading interface allows for market and limit orders, with advanced settings for slippage tolerance, gas price adjustments, and MEV Guard protection. Additional features include stop-loss functionality, real-time notifications for transactions, and a research section highlighting trending tokens. Alpha DEX combines the convenience of Telegram's interface with robust decentralized trading features, making it a versatile tool for both novice and experienced cryptocurrency traders.

Features
MEV Protection: Alpha DEX safeguards your trades against front-running and other exploitative strategies, ensuring fair and efficient transactions.
Limit Orders: Set your desired buy or sell prices, and Alpha Wallet will automate the process, allowing you to secure optimal trades even when offline.
Advanced Research Tools:
Sniping Scope: Analyze trader activities on new Ethereum token contracts before their launch.
Block X-Ray: Combine token discovery with trading tools to maximize profits.
Whale Signals: Receive instant notifications when major market players engage with specific tokens, enabling you to capitalize on emerging opportunities.
Universal Access: Access professional DEX trading tools, market insights, portfolio analytics, and signals through a convenient Telegram bot interface.

Performace
Alpha DEX is designed for swift and efficient trading, offering features like:
Sniping DEX Tokens: Quickly acquire newly registered DEX tokens to take advantage of early growth opportunities.
Automated Trading: Utilize Alpha DEX's research tools to set parameters such as market capitalization, volume, and liquidity for automated token trading.
Web Terminal Bydex: Gain a comprehensive market overview and execute trades faster than mobile platforms, enhancing your trading capabilities.

Security
Alpha DEX prioritizes user security through:
MEV Protection: Preventing front-running and other unfair trading practices to maintain transaction integrity.
Private Cloud Deployment: While not explicitly mentioned, adopting a private cloud can enhance data security by reducing the risk of cyberattacks.
Data Policy Compliance: Ensuring adherence to data privacy regulations like GDPR and CCPA to protect user information.

User Support
Alpha DEX offers user support through:
Telegram Bot Interface: Providing an accessible platform for users to interact with trading tools and receive assistance.
Upcoming Tutorials: Developing detailed guides to help users navigate and utilize the platform effectively.


Conclusion
Alpha DEX combines the convenience of centralized exchanges with the advantages of decentralized trading, offering a secure, efficient, and user-friendly platform. With features like MEV protection, limit orders, advanced research tools, and automated trading, it caters to both novice and experienced traders seeking to maximize their crypto trading potential.

Maestro Sniper Bot

Maestrobot offers a Telegram-based tool that automates the buying and selling of crypto tokens and most importantly allows its users to snipe tokens early. It’s engineered for traders who aim to capitalize on the market’s swift movements, providing features that allow for immediate token purchase upon liquidity addition, sales with a single button press, and the deployment of complex trading strategies.

Features
Key Features of Maestro Sniper Bot

Basic swaps → normal token contract address buy and sells

Auto buying → Maestro Sniper Bot has integration to multiple Telegram call channels, and you can setup autobuys for these calls

Sniping → Sniping, or God Mode, is a tool kit that covers every possible token launch situation

Sniping presales → If you wish to snipe a hyped presale (for example sniping a Pinksale presale) Maestrobot sniper offers a very easy interface for it

Copy-trade → Allows you to copy the buys and sells of tracked wallets at amazing speeds

Rug pull → Prevents liquidity fraud and other suspicious actions. The bot attempts to sell assets before a malicious transaction is processed, protecting investments

Anti-MEV → Hides transactions through a private relay to avoid MEV bots and copy traders, increasing security but potentially slowing down processing

Intelligent Slippage → Automatically adjusts slippage based on market conditions and price impact, not recommended for high-risk operations

Multi-Wallet → Allows purchasing from multiple wallets, complicating the copying of transactions by others

Max Gas Price → Sets a maximum gas price limit for transactions

Default Slippage → Sets a fixed slippage percentage for transactions without automatic adjustment

Gas Limit → Limits the maximum gas fee in dollars per transaction

Disabling Security Mode → Allows purchasing tokens despite detected risks or suspicious activity, ignoring warnings

The four most important buttons on the setting menu:

✅ Auto Buy = If you want the bot to auto buy immediately when the tracked wallet performs a buy transaction, you NEED to enable Auto Buy here and in your wallet settings (two locations).

✏️ Buy Amount = This serves as the maximum allowed auto buy amount. For example, if you set Buy Amount to 0.5 BNB and the tracked wallet buys 0.1 BNB, then the bot will also buy 0.1 BNB, matching the tracked wallet. However, if the tracked wallet buys any amount LARGER than 0.5 BNB, the bot will still only buy 0.5 BNB.

✅ Frontrun = This controls whether you would like to frontrun the tracked wallet’s buys and sells. Enabling Frontrun means that the bot will use higher gwei than the tracked wallet to get ahead of it.

✅ Blind Follow = The bot excludes transactions that don’t originate from the tracked address (fake/real airdrops, contract traders, multi-wallet transactions, etc.).

✏️Gas Price/Delta -✏️Slippage — 🌐Smart Slippage = These buttons allow you to override your wallet gas, slippage, and Smart Slippage settings for copytrade Auto Buys.


Security
Security is paramount in the world of cryptocurrency trading, and Maestro Trading Bot prioritizes the safety and security of users' funds and personal information. Employing stringent security measures such as encryption protocols, multi-factor authentication, and secure API integration, the bot ensures that users can trade with confidence, knowing that their assets are protected from potential threats. Additionally, Maestro Trading Bot operates on reputable exchanges, minimizing the risk of unauthorized access or fraudulent activities.

User Experience
In addition to its robust features and performance, Maestro Trading Bot offers a seamless and intuitive user experience. The bot's user-friendly interface simplifies the trading process, allowing users to execute trades and manage their portfolios effortlessly. Moreover, Maestro Trading Bot provides comprehensive documentation and educational resources, empowering users to enhance their trading skills and make informed decisions in the market. Additionally, the bot's dedicated customer support team is readily available to assist users with any inquiries or technical issues they may encounter.

Conclusion
In conclusion, Maestro Trading Bot emerges as a powerful tool for traders seeking to navigate the complexities of the cryptocurrency market with confidence and precision. With its extensive features, exceptional performance, robust security measures, and user-friendly interface, Maestro Trading Bot offers a comprehensive solution for traders of all levels. Whether you're a seasoned trader or just starting out, Maestro Trading Bot provides the tools and resources you need to master the art of cryptocurrency trading and achieve your financial goals.
